knimeNode.name: PDB Connector Combine XML Queries
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to combine separate XML Advanced queries into a new query with either AND or OR logic

intro.p: This node combines two advanced PDB XML queries using either AND or OR logic, allowing more complex queries to be generated using the XML output from the various PDB Connector nodes
The PDB Connector Combine XML Queries node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com
